title: Starting from scratch
creator_credit: Nihon Hoso Kyokai, UNICEF, Alastair Matheson and Horst Cerni
brief_description: The determined people of Tanzania in East Africa are “starting from scratch” to build up their country’s health, education and welfare services. We meet two women, typical of the many helping to build Tanzania’s future: Aurelia, a teacher trained with UNICEF assistance, and Mageta, a dietician travelling from village to village.
